
自动过易盾点选验证码  
  
地址：https://dun.163.com/trial/picture-click  
  
终端运行
1. git clone https://github.com/milkypunch/163dun-click.git

2. cd 163dun-click

3. pip install -r requirements.txt

4. python server.py # 开启服务器

5. python 163dun_click.py 

结果示例
